title: 08/18/2021 DPS Hour 1 Tebow Released and John Mara vs Taunting
itunes:title: 08/18/2021 DPS Hour 1 Tebow Released and John Mara vs Taunting
description:
LaVar Arrington, TJ Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress, in for Dan, discuss whether or not Tim Tebow deserved the chance he got in Jacksonville. The guys take issue with Giants President John Mara being "sick and tired of taunting" in the league and tell you where expectations should lie for OBJ going forward.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
